description: Businessman Trystian Sweet goes to the metal shop to pick up his private toys that he had left there for repair. Jackson Lawless and Curt Wooster are two blue-collar boys with a bad attitude. They don’t like well-to-do folks hanging around their shop, and decide to cause some trouble. Little do they know that Trystian is a badass SM freak – who needed his worn-out sex toys repaired from extreme usage. Trystian teaches Jackson and Curt a lesson they’ll never forget: he ties them up, pushes his cock into every one of their orifices, and demonstrates the full effect of his toys to their yelling faces.
title: Mayhem in The Metal Shop
